spell.name: Hunter's Quarry
entries: You take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action and magically choose one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} Force damage to your quarry whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB} or {@skill Survival|XPHB}) check you make to find it.
If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, on your turn you can choose a new creature you can see within range as your quarry (no action required).
This spell counts as hunterâ€™s mark for the purpose of any Ranger class feature or subclass feature.

spell.name: Panther's Quarry
entries: You take the Hide action and magically choose one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you gain the following benefits:

items: You deal an extra {@damage 1d6} Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll.
You can take the {@action Hide|XPBH} action as a bonus action.
Your qarry has Disadvantage on any Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB} or {@skill Survival|XPHB}) check made to find you.

entries: If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, on your turn you can choose a new creature you can see within range as your quarry (no action required).

spell.name: Cheetah's Quarry
entries: You take the {@action Dash|XPHB} action and magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you gain the following benefits:

items: You deal an extra {@damage 1d6} Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll.
You can take the {@action Dash|XPBH} action as a bonus action.
If you move at least 30 feet straight towards your quarry and then hit it with a melee attack on the same turn, your quarry must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

entries: If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, on your turn you can choose a new creature you can see within range as your quarry (no action required).

spell.name: Wolf's Quarry
entries: You take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action and magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. In addition, your allies have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against your quarry while it is within 5 feet of you.
If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, on your turn you can choose a new creature you can see within range as your quarry (no action required).

spell.name: Spider's Quarry
entries: You take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action and magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} Poison damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. In addition, once on your turn when you hit your quarry with an attack, it gains the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until it escapes (DC equals your spell save DC).
If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, on your turn you can choose a new creature you can see within range as your quarry (no action required).
